kw.name: Dado que leonardo efetua um get na rota
Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=data, url=http://localhost:3000, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: GET On Session
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: GET Request : url=http://localhost:3000/data path_url=/data headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.26.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=None

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Então valido o schema da API
Validate Jsonschema From File
kw.doc: Validate JSON according to schema, loaded from a file.
